messages.subject: NSR Christie's and Sotheby's auction catalogues for sale
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings all, For those that may have an interest in wood block prints, inro, netsuke etc... I have just listed 9 Christies and Sotheby s auction catalogues
messages.messageBody:
Greetings all,

For those that may have an interest in wood block prints, inro, netsuke
etc... I have just listed 9 Christies and Sotheby's auction catalogues on
eBay. They are all listed with no reserve and have a starting bid of 1 cent.
My user ID on eBay is "suppab". Here is the link. Thank you.

http://search.ebay.com/_W0QQfgtpZ1QQfrppZ25QQsassZsuppab

Best regards,

Danny Massey
www.nihontocraft.com


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
